name: A Day of Light by MEAR
metadata:
{"name": "A Day of Light by MEAR 1", "description": "In celebration of the longest night of the year in the longest year of our lives we're releasing our EP created for the Winter Solstice called 'A Day of Light'. Itb�s really a 17-minute-long piece meant to be listened to all at once. This piece was originally conceived as part of a commission for the Canadian Contemporary Dance Theatre and Human Body Expression. Two soft, subdued vocal tracks sandwich two boisterous, electro-Celtic instrumentals perfect for your midwinter dance party around a bonfire.

Originally released December 21, 2020

Music by Gregory Harrison and Frances Miller
Cello on The Gathering, Dusk Until Dawn and The Light by Blanche IsraC+l
Recorded and mixed by Gregory Harrison at Monarch Studios

Cover art by Kerry Zentner", "image": "ipfs://bafybeieudtqhjg34dqnus462ol47m4ozeujqmhlok7ozy7mkig5sv4477y", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeic7dx5y6rwumnpgcwdck433qivvzbl5it2zp7r5c2mbfigypmzzty", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "A Day of Light by MEAR"}}
